description:
A chest harness keeps small children (who do not have defined hips) upright and in position when climbing or when hanging. Use it in combination with a seat harness for comfortable safe climbing.

  • Pre-threaded double-back buckles are quick to adjust
  • Endoframe construction evenly distributes pressure and is supportive and comfortable
  • 2 tie-in points
  • Use in conjunction with a seat harness
name: Petzl Body Chest Harness - Children to Youths
